title: Fort Scott National Historic Site: Planning A Field Trip
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Field Trips     Planning A Field Trip                   Plan A Field Trip       By following the links in the left hand column, you will find more information about eating on the grounds, safety guidelines, planning a self guided visit and other pertinent information.  Â     Nevada High School students dressed in living history clothing present programs to area youth in grades K-4 during our Life on the Frontier program NPS Photo
